text: Brett Tombul ( Cooper; b. October 12, 2001) is an American conservative commentator, YouTuber and actress. She previously worked for The Daily Wire, and was the host of The Comments Section with Brett Cooper on YouTube. ==Early Life== Cooper was born in 2001. She said that her dad wanted her mum to abort her when he knew that she was pregnant. Cooper also said that her parents did not let her watch Disney movies when she was a child. When she was 5 years old, Cooper became an actress. At 15 years old, Cooper emancipated herself from her divorced parents by working and hiring her own attorney to represent herself in court proceedings. * * * * * ==Career== Cooper was on Broadway until she was 10, and was in productions including The Sound of Music (as Brigitta) and Annie (as Molly). Cooper was a schoolgirl in the movie Parental Guidance. When she was 13, Cooper played Jessica, a girl who likes fencing in Gortimer Gibbon. She also played a policeman's daughter in the television show Shots Fired. In 2018, Cooper played a character named Trailer Parker (who is bullied for being poor) in the television show Heathers. ===The Daily Wire=== Cooper stopped acting in Hollywood after she chose not to get the vaccine for COVID-19. Instead, she started publishing right-wing political commentaries for the Foundation for Economic Education (FEE), PragerU, and Turning Point USA (TPUSA). She then started working for Ben Shapiro at The Daily Wire and got her own podcast called The Comments Section with Brett Cooper. After The Daily Wire created its own streaming service called the Daily Wire Plus (DW+) then, Cooper started acting for them in their television show The Pendragon Cycle about King Arthur and playing Snow White in their Movie Snow White and the Evil Queen. Cooper left The Daily Wire in December 2024. ==Personal life == Cooper is married to Alex Tombul, a childhood friend. They live on a farm in Franklin, Tennessee with their cattle. She voted for Donald Trump in the 2024 presidential election. ==References== Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:American YouTubers Category:Political commentators Category:Actors from Nashville, Tennessee Category:Singers from Nashville, Tennessee
title: Brett Cooper
